title: Computer/Resolution Help.
body:
So I was having a resolution of roughly... 1900x1000-ish. I think 1900x1080.

Anyways, it's been running at that 100% fine for quite a long while.

Suddenly while in game, the screen went entirely black. Then I noticed my mouse was moving oddly. After game I noticed what went on-- my resolution reverted.

Then my computer went on to say that higher resolutions for this monitor arent supported (they are, it's always allowed many many more options well above the 1360x780 it's at currently until now). I tried using NVidia to make a custom one but it won't allow that. I updated my driver and restarted my computer twice. Also unplugged and replugged in my monitor. 

I'm kinda unsure what to do.

replies.body: It sounds like you might be having a driver or hardware failure, which can result in issues like a black screen with sounds.  I suggest starting off with our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure your drivers are up to date and in order.  The steps there should do the trick!

Didnt work. 

I also checked my adapter, and it does show it's working properly.

https://puu.sh/uAfNo/5e288ddb3f.png

The messaging can show that it's working properly, but it can start having issues when strained or trying to render a specific action such as in-game.  Since the guide didn't help, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look.  Grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to grab some logs to attach to your ticket.  Hang tight until then!
